testsuite.name: bankmanagement.PaymentControllerSpec

testcase.name: When transactions are requested, they are rendered
when account is not chosen, valid error message is displayed
Cannot transfer amount between same accounts
when succesfully transfered, amount is deducted and credited to relevant accounts

testsuite.system-out: --Output from When transactions are requested, they are rendered-- --Output from when account is not chosen, valid error message is displayed-- --Output from Cannot transfer amount between same accounts-- --Output from Cannot transfer amount less than 0[0]-- --Output from Cannot transfer amount less than 0[1]-- --Output from Handled when service throws exception-- --Output from when succesfully transfered, amount is deducted and credited to relevant accounts--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from When transactions are requested, they are rendered-- --Output from when account is not chosen, valid error message is displayed-- --Output from Cannot transfer amount between same accounts-- --Output from Cannot transfer amount less than 0[0]-- --Output from Cannot transfer amount less than 0[1]-- --Output from Handled when service throws exception-- --Output from when succesfully transfered, amount is deducted and credited to relevant accounts--
